prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Brass, Bass, Guitar, Piano, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Brass, Bass, Guitar, and Piano, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Brass, Bass, Guitar, and Piano, but Drums are absent.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Brass, Bass, Guitar, and Piano, omitting Drums.
